Package edu.kit.kastel.mcse.ardoco.core.common.util.wordsim

Record Class ComparisonContext

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
edu.kit.kastel.mcse.ardoco.core.common.util.wordsim.ComparisonContext
public record ComparisonContext(String firstString, String secondString, Word firstWord, Word secondWord, boolean lemmatize) extends Record
A ComparisonContext contains all information that can be used for comparing similarity between objects that occur within ArDoCo. The fields firstString and secondString are always not null. The field lemmatize decides whether the lemmatized version of both words should be used for comparison.

  • Method Details

    • firstTerm

      public String firstTerm()
      Finds the most appropriate string representation by the first object in this comparison object. This method can be used as a shorthand to avoid going through all variables that could possibly represent the first object.
      Returns:
      the most appropriate string presentation of the first object in this comparison

    • secondTerm

      public String secondTerm()
      Finds the most appropriate string representation by the second object in this comparison object. This method can be used as a shorthand to avoid going through all variables that could possibly represent the second object.
      Returns:
      the most appropriate string presentation of the second object in this comparison

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object); primitive components are compared with '=='.
      Specified by:
      equals in class Record
      Parameters:
      o - the object with which to compare
      Returns:
      true if this object is the same as the o argument; false otherwise.
